goons.biography: Snag Tugsman, once a renowned beast tamer from the Crater Isles, now wields the jaws and claws of the fiercest creatures as weapons and armor. Known for his brutal combat style and the ability to regenerate rapidly by consuming the flesh of fallen enemies, Tugsman strikes terror in the hearts of his foes while leading his squad into the frenzy of battle.

goons.name: Master Bait Man

abilities.name: Monstrous Lure

abilities.description: Consumes a defeated enemy unit on the field to gain a temporary boost in attack strength and heal.

goons.description: Master Bait Man, a cunning trapper among the Meat Warriors, utilizes bones and furs to craft deceptive lures that mimic living prey, drawing monstrous beasts into lethal traps. His armor, adorned with the jaws and claws of his most impressive catches, serves both as protection and as a testament to his prowess in the hunt.

abilities.name: Rampage Tug

goons.flavor_text: Harnessing the primal fury of the bone fields, the Frenzied Meat Tugsman thrives on the thrill of close-quarters combat and the glory of the hunt.

goons.lore: Born from the beast-heavy jungles and raised among the bone mounds of ancient predators, Gut Horder has developed an insatiable hunger for both battle and the monstrous prey he consumes. His body, etched with scars and adorned with beastly trophies, is a living testament to countless brutal hunts.

visuals.body_features: Protruding brows, oversized teeth, scarified flesh with bone piercings

goons.name: Corpse Grinder
goons.description: A colossal brute, Corpse Grinder is a feared warrior of the MEAT faction. His gargantuan bone club, crafted from the femur of a megabeast, is adorned with jagged teeth and hardened sinew. His armor is a patchwork of rib cages and tusk shields, making him nearly impervious to attacks. Known for his blood-curdling battle cries, Corpse Grinder embodies the primal terror of the Meat Warriors.

abilities.name: Bone Smash
abilities.description: Deal massive damage to a single enemy unit, applying a bleed effect that continues to damage the enemy over three turns.

abilities.name: Roar of the Predator

abilities.name: Feast of Flesh
abilities.description: Regenerate health by consuming a fallen enemy, gaining a temporary strength boost.

goons.flavor_text: Where he walks, bones crunch and enemies falter. The Corpse Grinder never leaves a battlefield without wearing new trophies.

goons.biography: Raised in the heart of the Carnivore Jungles, Brain Smasher learned to hunt before he could walk. His armor, adorned with the bones and fangs of the deadliest predators, serves as a testament to his prowess in battle and his savage might.

goons.description: A towering brute, adorned in the bones and hides of fallen mega-beasts. Wielding a giant club made from the spine and skull of a monstrous creature, the Skeleton Crusher embodies the terror and might of the MEAT faction.

goons.flavor_text: Hailing from the rib canyons where behemoths' bones reach the sky, Man Slaughterer wears the jawbone of a gargantuan predator as a helm and wields a club fashioned from a fossilized spine. Each swing echoes the brutality of the primeval hunts.

goons.flavor_text: With every swing of his giant bone club, Man Slaughterer carves through the ranks of his enemies, harvesting their remains for his next gruesome armor piece.
